title: Paws & Play Adoption Day
brief: A fun outdoor gathering where families can meet adoptable pets.

title: Free Pet Vaccination Drive
brief: Rabies and 5-in-1 vaccination for rescued animals and owned pets.

title: Shelter Clean-Up Day
brief: Be part of our quarterly clean-up activity to improve the animals' living spaces.

title: Community Education Talk
brief: Learn about responsible pet ownership and animal welfare.

title: Pet Food Donation Drive
brief: Collecting dry and wet food for rescued cats and dogs.

title: Rescue Transport Volunteers Meetup
brief: Orientation for new rescue transport volunteers.

title: Holiday Pet Adoption Fair
brief: Find a furry friend to bring home this holiday season.

title: Vet Consultation Outreach
brief: Free basic pet checkups for low-income pet owners.

title: Stray Feeding Program Launch
brief: Kick-off event for our community stray feeding initiative.

title: Pet Grooming for a Cause
brief: Get your pet groomed and help raise funds for rescue operations.
